title: Ano Natsu de Matteru Special
alternative_title: Waiting in the Summer Special, あの夏で待ってる 特別編「僕達は高校最後の夏を過ごしながら、 あの夏を待っている。」
description: A special episode of Ano Natsu de Matteru which will be included in the Blu-ray box set, set to be released in Summer 2014.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
